q: How do I request new features or report bugs?
a: That's easy! Just send an email to support@digigoat.app describing the issue or feature you'd like to see.

q: How do I get started with DigiGoat?
a: Great question! This website is still under construction, but we're working hard to bring you a comprehensive guide soon. Once it's ready, you'll be able to find it on our Getting Started guide for step-by-step instructions on setting up your website.
